The Computer Software Engineering Technology program at Thaddeus Stevens College of Technology in Lancaster, Pennsylvania.

CSET Computer Software Engineering Technology

Welcome to CSET

The Computer Software Engineering Technology program at Thaddeus Stevens College of Technology prepares students to design, develop, and build customized software programs. Students will learn basic programming, how to interpret specifications, application of software architecture, verification and validation principles, and software performance standards. The program emphasizes a practical hands-on education as software projects are required each semester.

News

Fall 2020 Update

01 Aug 2020

The college has announced their re-opening plan for the fall semester. CSET and six other programs will be fully remote, including gen-ed classes. Our program will be one of the easiest to convert to an online-only setup, but it will still take some time to iron out any kinks.

The college will post announcements or changes to the plan at that website. Be sure to check your college email account for updates as well.
